video.title: Noddy in Toyland
video.synopsis: Little Noddy joins his pals on adventures all over Toyland, taking on Wobbly mishaps, goblin gizmos and inept pirates, with boundless enthusiasm.

episodes.synopsis: When Noddy accidentally scratches Car, he borrows a magic paintbrush from Big Ears. / Noddy thinks of a game for the Little Skittle birthday party.
episodes.title: Noddy and the Magic Paintbrush / Giant Jelly

episodes.synopsis: Tessie wants to compile a photo album for Dinah’s birthday. / When Baby Ball comes to visit, he’s not the timid little thing Noddy remembers.
episodes.title: Tessie's Photo Fun / BB Comes to Play

episodes.synopsis: Noddy teaches Whiz how to play hide and seek. / Noddy tries all he can to make Mr. Plod laugh, but Mr. Plod is determined to keep a straight face.
episodes.title: Hide and Seek Whiz / Mr. Plod Loses His Laugh

episodes.synopsis: Bumpy gets a hold of a remote control that causes havoc around Toytown. / The Little Skittles are overly excited about their first Domino Day.
episodes.title: Bumpy and the Remote Control / Domino Town

episodes.synopsis: Car uses spiffy new tires to chase the goblins through the woods. / Noddy and Tessie plan a picnic so everyone can try her new singalong machine.
episodes.title: Googleberry Pie Day / Tessie's Singalong Picnic

episodes.synopsis: Noddy brings Mr. Wobbly Man a tin of treacle so he can make a tart for Pudding Day. / The toys have planned a surprise birthday picnic for Mr. Plod.
episodes.title: Noddy's Sticky Day / Mr. Plod's Picnic Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Lindy is so eager to visit her sisters that she uses magic. / Noddy tries to stay one step ahead of Tessie to surprise her for her birthday.
episodes.title: Come Back Lindy / Happy Birthday Tessie

episodes.synopsis: When the circus is forced to cancel their show, Noddy decides the show will go on. / Bumpy is muddy. Magic gets rid of the mud but rids of Bumpy too.
episodes.title: Noddy's Circus / Invisible Bumpy

episodes.synopsis: Noddy plans a parade, but the goblins mix up the routes. / Mr. Plod knocks some "go faster" dust on his trousers and zooms off around Toytown.
episodes.title: The Grand Parade / The Fastest Trousers

episodes.synopsis: The goblins try to spoil Noddy’s roller disco with a weather-wrecking kit. / Gobbo has so much fun with Bumpy and Noddy that the fun-o-meter explodes.
episodes.title: Noddy Saves the Roller Disco / A Test for Gobbo

episodes.synopsis: The goblins make themselves invisible to cause mischief. / After overhearing the rainbow is what brings color to Toytown, the goblins try to steal it.
episodes.title: Noddy and the Invisible Goblins / Noddy and the Rainbow Robber

episodes.synopsis: Noddy empties the contents of a magic watering can on Tessie’s tomatoes. / Frustrated with the goblins spoiling her game, Lindy casts a spell on Sly.
episodes.title: Tessie's Garden Grows...and Grows / The Goblins Come to Play

episodes.synopsis: Noddy visits his pirate friends and teaches them about burying treasure. / The mermaids' ballet is interrupted by pirates who can’t stop their ship.
episodes.title: Yo Ho Noddy / High Tide
